channel.title: What's the most suitable hosting for Social Networks?
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
I am looking for some suggestions for the most suitable hosting providers for a Social Network startup. Must have the following considerations:
(1) Cheap (2) Scalable (3) Dependable
Thanks for all your suggestions in advance

item.title: What's the most suitable hosting for Social Networks?
item.dc:creator: craigvn
item.description:
Either Azure or AWS will do the job.

Read full topic
item.source: What's the most suitable hosting for Social Networks?

item.title: What's the most suitable hosting for Social Networks?
item.dc:creator: mj_langford
item.description:
Well, if you can suffer the necessary architecture…Amazon Lambda is promising for this. It works off a node.js or java core…but that allows languages which work on top of those two as well

Read full topic
item.source: What's the most suitable hosting for Social Networks?
